text: Shenkeng Old Street The Shenkeng Old Street () is an old street in Shenkeng District, New Taipei, Taiwan. ==Features== The street is famous for its tofu- related food, such as tofu gourmet, tofu snacks and tofu popsicle from various types of tofu. ==Transportation== The street is accessible by taxi from Muzha Station of Taipei Metro. ==See also== * List of roads in Taiwan * List of tourist attractions in Taiwan ==References== Category:Streets in Taiwan Category:Transportation in New Taipei
title: Shenkeng Old Street
